name: Warface - Rifleman Early Access Pack
description:
Warface is a first-person MMO shooter that comes with a variety of PvP and PvE game modes, diverse arsenal and plenty of tactical gameplay. 

Purchasing this pack allows you to play the Early Access version of the game before its full release.

The pack contains:
- Access to the pre-release version of the game
- FN SCAR-H assault rifle and its golden variant
- Rifleman of the Paragon Squad skin
- 300 Kredits
